task_summary: echo a message then read current time
assumptions: tool registry provides echo_tool and get_time
risks: time output format may vary by environment

steps.title: echo the message
steps.description: Call echo_tool with a short text.
steps.deliverable: A tool output containing the echoed text.
steps.acceptance: execution_results contains step_1 ok=true and output.echo is present.

steps.title: get current time
steps.deliverable: A tool output containing current time fields.
steps.acceptance: execution_results contains step_2 ok=true and output is JSON-safe.
